channel.title: arduino on Filip Livancic
channel.description: Recent content in arduino on Filip Livancic

item.title: Servo Turret Control
item.description: Summary This project has been made to practise the use of sending instructions to various electronics for both the Arduino and the Raspberry Pi. I’ve segmented this project into two parts/versions: Arduino - Mouse Control via Serial Communications Port Raspberry Pi - Mouse Control via Python Tkinter Program Arduino The arduino project is very simple, there is a program written in Processing which takes the mouse inputs send strings (enclosed in <>) to the Arduino via serial communications.
